channel.title: Making The Progress Bar Work In Microsoft V C#?
channel.description:
so ive created this so far: http://007pkerz.com/browser/test.application
but the progress bar doesnt seem to act up? its probably cause i didnt code it to do anything right? so how would i make it "work" like the bar in IE
